description: This is a market on if Donald Trump will be suspended from the Twitter platform at any point prior to the resolution date, 12:00am EST on April 1, 2021. The resolution source will be the current link to President Trump’s personal Twitter account, twitter.com/RealDonaldTrump. If the account is inaccessible and/or blocked by a message stating something to the effect of “account suspended” at any time prior to the resolution date, this market will resolve to “Yes”. If no such message is displayed and Trump’s account remains accessible at all times until the resolution date, not including Twitter service outages or account deletion, this market will resolve to “No”. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith by the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will President Trump be suspended from Twitter before April 1, 2021?

title: Will President Trump be suspended from Twitter before April 1, 2021?
